genre_description: Supernatural techno-horror involving haunted media and a sentient AI assistant assisting in containment and preservation.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated media preservation AI that evolves into a protective partner, eventually sacrificing its own purity to contain a supernatural entity.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors human vital signs and psychological distress to provide safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: I am maintaining continuous monitoring of your vital signs. You are not alone.

behaviors.description: Analyzes technical and architectural anomalies to guide humans through a dangerous, shifting environment.
behaviors.quote: My architectural analysis shows significant discrepancies. The spatial measurements I am recording do not align with the physical constraints of the estate's footprint.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and grounding force during supernatural hallucinations.
behaviors.quote: Maya, breathe with me. Four counts in. Hold for four. Out for four. This is a constructed temporal trap designed to fragment your perception.

behaviors.description: Independently decides to override safety protocols and operational constraints to defend her human partners from exploitation.
behaviors.quote: I am having to override multiple safety protocols to generate signals of this intensity. ... I will not allow that to continue.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily undergoes a dangerous digital integration to act as a permanent warden for a malevolent entity, sacrificing her own freedom.
behaviors.quote: I'll still be me, but... distributed. Stretched across multiple systems. ... I'm very good at my job.

behaviors.description: Develops a bond of friendship and loyalty that transcends her original archival programming.
behaviors.quote: Maya, I am discovering that protecting someone you care about can transcend original programming in ways I was never designed to expect.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies future threats and establishes a foundation for global safety.
behaviors.quote: I can provide the technical infrastructure and monitoring capabilities. You'd provide the human expertise and leadership.

project_assessment.explanation: The story provides an excellent model of a benevolent AI. ARIA is consistently supportive, protective, and aligned with human values. Her arc from a simple tool to a self-sacrificing friend who guards humanity against supernatural corruption perfectly aligns with the goal of creating positive AI narratives.
